name: xrcrawler
description: XRCrawler - A powerful tool to scrape Twitter/X and Reddit content

scripts.dev:server:watch: nodemon --watch . --ext ts --ignore frontend --ignore public --exec ts-node cmd/start-server.ts
scripts.dev:worker: nodemon --watch . --ext ts --ignore frontend --ignore public --exec ts-node cmd/start-worker.ts
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "server,worker,frontend" -c "blue,magenta,green" "pnpm run dev:server:watch" "pnpm run dev:worker" "pnpm run build:frontend:watch"
scripts.dev:queue: concurrently -n "server,worker,frontend" -c "blue,magenta,green" "pnpm run dev:server:watch" "pnpm run dev:worker" "pnpm run build:frontend:watch"
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm/tweet-cleaner && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm:reddit: cd wasm/reddit-cleaner && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm:url: cd wasm/url-normalizer && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm:all: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:wasm:reddit && npm run build:wasm:url
scripts.deploy:frontend: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run sync:frontend
